mapper.select: select catedetailcode from post inner join category on post.catedetailcode = category.catedetailcode where catename=#{catename} AND catedetailname = #{cateAll} AND divisioncode = 2

select * from postreport inner join member on postreport.reportid = member.id inner join post on postreport.postnum = post.postnum
postreport.divisioncode = 1
postreport.divisioncode = 2
order by postreport.postnum desc LIMIT 0,8

select * from post inner join member on post.memberid = member.id
post.divisioncode = 1
post.divisioncode = 2
order by post.viewcount desc LIMIT 0,15
